content:
As a result of the Russian attack by shock drones of the type of ShahED in the Poltava region, the infrastructure object was damaged.

About thisreportedThe head of the Poltava Ova Philip Pronin.

“The restless night in Poltava region. The enemy attacked our UAV area again. There are several hits into the infrastructure object in the territory of Poltava district, ”the message reads.

Philip Pronin noted that there were no victims of the enemy attack.

As reported by the Armyinform, at night the ladders were recorded at night Shahd-136/131, nine of themwas destroyedunits of mobile fire groups of Defense Forces of Ukraine.
title: In Poltava Region "Shahda" hit the infrastructure object
description: This was reported by the head of the Poltava Ova Philip Pronin. "The restless night in Poltava region ....
author: Army Inform
